metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5816 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Process lifetime issue in Chrome in Google Chrome on Android prior to74.0.3729.108 allowed a remote attacker to potentially persist an exploitedprocess via a crafted HTML page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-5816` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
